00016  /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    cnbit.h
00018  * Purpose: Header file for N-bit encoding information.
00019  * Dependencies: should only be included from hcompi.h
00020  * Invokes: none
00021  * Contents: Structures & definitions for N-bit encoding.
00022  * Structure definitions:
00023  * Constant definitions:
00024  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 
00026 /* avoid re-inclusion */
00027 #ifndef __CNBIT_H
00028 #define __CNBIT_H
00029 
00030 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00031 extern      "C"
00032 {
00033 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00034

00036    ** from cnbit.c
00037  */

00039     extern int32 HCPcnbit_stread
00040                 (accrec_t * rec);
00041 
00042     extern int32 HCPcnbit_stwrite
00043                 (accrec_t * rec);
00044 
00045     extern int32 HCPcnbit_seek
00046                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 offset, int origin);
00047 
00048     extern int32 HCPcnbit_inquire
00049                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 *pfile_id, uint16 *ptag, uint16 *pref,
00050                int32 *plength, int32 *poffset, int32 *pposn, int16 *paccess,
00051                  int16 *pspecial);
00052 
00053     extern int32 HCPcnbit_read
00054                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 length, void * data);
00055 
00056     extern int32 HCPcnbit_write
00057                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 length, const void * data);
00058 
00059     extern intn HCPcnbit_endaccess
00060                 (accrec_t * access_rec);
00061

00065 
00066 /* size of the N-bit buffer */
00067 #define NBIT_BUF_SIZE   (MAX_NT_SIZE*64)
00068 /* size of the N-bit mask buffer (same as buffer size for now) */
00069 #define NBIT_MASK_SIZE  (MAX_NT_SIZE)
00070 
00071 typedef struct
00072 {                               /* structure to hold bit vector info */
00073     intn        offset,         /* offset of the bit information */
00074                 length;         /* number of bits in the information */
00075     uint8       mask;           /* mask for this bit vector */
00076 }
00077 nbit_mask_info_t;
00078 
00079 /* N-bit [en|de]coding information */
00080 typedef struct
00081   {
00082       int32       nt;           /* number type of data we are encoding */
00083       intn        nt_size;      /* size of the number-type in the file */
00084       intn        fill_one;     /* whether to fill with 1's or not (0's) */
00085       intn        sign_ext;     /* whether to sign extend or not */
00086       uint8       buffer[NBIT_BUF_SIZE];    /* buffer for expanding n-bit data in */
00087       intn        buf_pos;      /* current offset in the expansion buffer */
00088       intn        mask_off,     /* offset of the bit to start masking with */
00089                   mask_len;     /* number of bits to mask */
00090       int32       offset;       /* offset in the file in terms of bytes */
00091       uint8       mask_buf[NBIT_MASK_SIZE];     /* buffer to hold the bitmask */
00092       nbit_mask_info_t mask_info[NBIT_MASK_SIZE];   /* information about the mask */
00093       intn        nt_pos;       /* current byte to read or write */
00094   }
00095 comp_coder_nbit_info_t;
00096 
00097 #ifndef CNBIT_MASTER
00098 extern funclist_t cnbit_funcs;  /* functions to perform N-bit encoding */
00099 #else
00100 funclist_t  cnbit_funcs =
00101 {                               /* functions to perform N-bit encoding */
00102     HCPcnbit_stread,
00103     HCPcnbit_stwrite,
00104     HCPcnbit_seek,
00105     HCPcnbit_inquire,
00106     HCPcnbit_read,
00107     HCPcnbit_write,
00108     HCPcnbit_endaccess
00109 };
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 #endif /* __CNBIT_H */
